name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Appellant v. STANDARD INVESTMENTS CORPORATION
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth, Department of Transportation v. Standard Investments Corp.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Appellant v. STANDARD INVESTMENTS CORPORATION.

casebody.head_matter:
485 A.2d 392
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Appellant v. STANDARD INVESTMENTS CORPORATION.

Argued Dec. 4, 1984.
Decided Dec. 14, 1984.

Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
